DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the safety and efficacy of a new carboxymethylcellulose based eye drop formula to Refresh Contacts® for lubricating and rewetting contact lenses.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare a New Eye Drop Formulation With Refresh Contacts®
DOC.criteria: Adapted contact wearer with daily usage of at least 6 hours a day, 5 days a week. Wearing monovision lenses Have had refractive surgery within the previous 12 months Have infection of the eye, eyelids or eye structures.
